meanings.sent1: The carven wooden chest was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: The carven details on the door added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The carven chair looked like it was whispering secrets to anyone who sat on it.
meanings.sent4: Her carven necklace seemed to hold ancient stories within its intricate design.
meanings.sent5: The carven patterns on the wall seemed to come alive in the flickering candlelight.

meanings.sent1: The carven statue of the lion stood proudly in the square.
meanings.sent2: The carven figurehead on the ship was a work of art.
meanings.sent3: The carven pumpkin had a mischievous grin carved into it.
meanings.sent4: His carven initials on the tree trunk marked their special spot in the woods.
meanings.sent5: The carven symbols on the ancient stone tablet held a mysterious message.
